@graph.headline: How To Leverage Entities & OptizenAI For Rich Shopify Product Descriptions At Scale
@graph.description: Learn how to use OptizenAI to extract entities and create enriched Shopify product descriptions using AI, the PAS Framework, and entity-based SEO optimization.

@graph.name: How to Use OptizenAI for Shopify Product Descriptions
@graph.description: Step-by-step process for using OptizenAI to create entity-rich product descriptions

step.name: Extract Entities from Wikipedia
step.text: Use ChatGPT 4 Plus to extract entities from Wikipedia pages for brands or product types that have Wikipedia entries.

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI and search for products by name or tags, then select products using checkboxes.

step.name: Select PAS Framework Prompt
step.text: Select the 'PAS Framework - Entities - Internal Links' from the dropdown under Product Description prompt field and replace square bracket sections.

step.name: Execute and Review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt, check output in Log section, and choose to keep or restore the update.
